CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Actual_Date__c )) , Actual_Date__c , IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Projected_Off_Air_Date__c ) ) , Projected_Off_Air_Date__c , IF( AND(NOT( ISBLANK( Target_Date__c )), Target_Date_Probability__c >= (8/10) ) , Target_Date__c , IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Concurrent_Operations_End_Date__c ) ) ,Concurrent_Operations_End_Date__c , IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Phase_Completion_Date__c ) ) , Phase_Completion_Date__c , Commencement_Date__c )))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for reporting, the date when the station was off air or most likely to be off air. Logic is: 1. Actual Off 600MHz Date 2. Projected Off Air 3. Agreement Date (prob at 80+) 3. Concurrent Operations End 4.Phase Completion
CustomField.label: Expected Off air Date
